module: Module-level comment: The `altera_up_video_dual_clock_fifo` module implements a dual-clock FIFO for video data, facilitating synchronized data transfer across different clock domains (write and read). Inputs include clocks (`wrclk`, `rdclk`), data (`data`), and control signals (`wrreq`, `rdreq`), while outputs provide status (`wrusedw`, `wrfull`, `rdusedw`, `rdempty`, `q`). Internally, it handles synchronization and buffering through an instantiated `dcfifo_component` configured with specific parameters for optimal performance in video applications.
